Author: mrlynch#5735
Content: as a above - console only, ufw, fail2ban, ssh via publickey, monitoring and if possible and if you have the time to fine tune, setup an IDS as well such as snort or suricata <- that is a rabbit hole you might not want to go down; you have been warned

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: keeping your wallets as small as possible is the magic behind having the best notary stats

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: RPCs I created have been merged for that, which makes wallet maintenance  a trivial task... You do need a utxo managemet solution to use them though.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: merging mining rewards and any very old utxo.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: allowing the wallet to run inside a 1000 block window seems to work pretty well

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @blackjok3r oh no, that makes being a NN op too easy!!!!!!

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: lol

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: manually cleaning up dozens of  300MB wallet.dat's was the "secret sauce" :abusedsmily:

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: the more coins we notarize the worse the problem gets, and KMD takes too long to restart

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: `cleanwallettransactions` is making it into KMD proper ?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: so a solution to that problem without needing a restart was required. Quite a few nodes have it now. Its in FSM already from LABS merge

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Assumeing that it makes it down for the hard fork.

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: it's in jl777 or FSM branch now?

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: last i heard it was only in LABS fork, i think

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: LABS was merged to FSM

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: then some of its code was disabled

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: But since then, I have changed it quite a bit to get MoMoM workign properly... so it needs another merge

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: We still ahve testing to carry out first though

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: story of our lives üòÉ

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
Hey, we are preparing to launch a new election site with all the info about notary nodes and the elections.

We want to give an accurate description about the notary node daily routines & duties to not get candidates who come with unrealistic expectations and then drop the ball after they find out how much work it is.

Could you guys help write that content? It doesn't have to be super long, just to give an idea. The content would be written with markdown, and no need to worry about readability or grammar as we got an editor who will finalize the text.

Content:
one step I was not sure is this one: Create the wallet passphrase (unlocking) api call at ~/SuperNET/iguana/wp_7776 - this gets called at notary start up

curl --url "http://127.0.0.1:7776" --data "{\"method\":\"walletpassphrase\",\"params\":[\"YOUR VERY SECURE P
